properties.description: The required name, label or formal title of the project being described. This is the primary way of naming this project in the system.
properties.title: Project Title

properties.description: Use this if there are other names or titles associated with the project.
properties.title: Alternate Titles

properties.description: The type of alternate title such as Abbreviation.
properties.title: Alternate Title Type

properties.description: This is a general description or abstract about what you know about the project.
properties.title: Summary Description

properties.description: Keywords, subject terms, key phrases classification codes, etc., ideally drawn from a thesaurus, which classifies or describes the project.
properties.title: Keywords

properties.description: The type of keyword, such as Subject, Geographic or Temporal. Leaving type blank would imply general keywords.
properties.title: Keyword Type

properties.description: Formal strings of characters that are used to uniquely identify the project in various systems. This can also be used to create your own formal identifier for your project.
properties.title: Identifiers

properties.description: The name of the system or standard for which the identifier was created.
properties.title: Identifier Type

properties.description: A standard identifier for the entity, e.g. ISSN, opus no., etc., or a URI.
properties.title: Identifier

properties.description: This is the statement of different kinds of rights that are asserted with the project. This can include such things as access rights, credit lines, etc.
properties.title: Rights

properties.description: The type of rights such as Access or Use Rights.
properties.title: Rights Type

properties.description: A statement of the ownership and/or access rights associated with the project.
properties.title: Rights

properties.description: A brief note pertaining to the rights being described.
properties.title: Rights Notes

properties.description: Other entities that are related to the project, such as the name of a larger project or entity of which the project being described is or was a part.
properties.title: Relationships

properties.description: The type of relationship such as Related Project.
properties.title: Relationship Type

properties.description: A brief note pertaining to the relationship being described.
properties.title: Relationship Notes

index.key: Project Data Access and Use Constraints

options.index: Project Data Access and Use Constraints

properties.description: General notes that provide descriptions for other aspects relevant to your understanding of the project, for which you have no other way to enter in this form.
properties.title: Notes

properties.description: The type of note such as General Notes, Historical Notes, etc.
properties.title: Note Type

properties.description: This can be used to register specific dates associated with the project, such as the year it was begun or end, date of publication, etc.
properties.title: Time Periods

properties.description: The type of time period being described such as Project Duration.
properties.title: Time Period Type

properties.description: A time period name, e.g. "the last voyage of Sinbad", "20th Century".
properties.title: Textual Date

properties.description: A specific numeric date associated with the project being described.
properties.title: Numeric Dates

properties.description: The type of numeric date such as begin or end date.
properties.title: Date Type

properties.description: A brief note pertaining to the time period being described.
properties.title: Time Period Notes

properties.description: Place or places that are primarily associated with the project being described, such as a site which is the focus of the research or a site were specimen were collected .
properties.title: Place Information

properties.description: The type of place being described, e.g. Project Site.
properties.title: Place Type

properties.description: Name of a geographic location pertaining to the project being described e.g. Country, Province, Region, etc.
properties.title: Geographic Areas

properties.description: The Geographic Coordinates for the place being described.
properties.title: Geographic Coordinates

properties.description: This is used to identify the time period during which the geometry is relevant to the project.
properties.title: Place Time Period

properties.description: The type of date related to the place.
properties.title: Place Date Type

properties.description: A time period name, e.g. "the last voyage of Sinbad", "20th Century".
properties.title: Textual Date

properties.description: A specific numeric date or dates associated with the place being described.
properties.title: Numeric Date

properties.description: The type of numeric date.
properties.title: Date Type

properties.description: A brief note pertaining to the place being described.
properties.title: Place Notes

properties.description: This is used to identify people or organizations that have a special relationship to the project. For example, the person who directed the project, a project manager, etc., or an organization that sponsored or funded it.
properties.title: Related People and Organizations

properties.description: The role of the person related to the project, such as “director ” or “project manager”.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: The name of the person.
properties.title: Person Name

properties.description: The role of the organization related to the species, such as “sponsor” or “funder”.
properties.title: Role

properties.description: The name of the organization.
properties.title: Organization Name

properties.description: This is used to describe the background or meaning of a project, such as its religious or historical context.
properties.title: Context

properties.description: The type of context e.g. Historical.
properties.title: Context Type

properties.description: Brief text describing the context of the project.
properties.title: Context

properties.description: This is a place to identify research methodologies that are central to the project or are the research focus of it.
properties.title: Methods

properties.description: The type of method used.
properties.title: Method Type

properties.description: Brief text describing the method used.
properties.title: Method

properties.description: This is a place to identify research techniques that are central to the project or are the research focus of it.
properties.title: Techniques

properties.description: The type of techniques used.
properties.title: Technique Type

properties.description: Brief text describing the technique.
properties.title: Technique

properties.description: Either a textual or formal numeric description of the dimensions of a project, such as cost in dollars, time in days, etc.
properties.title: Measurements

properties.description: This is for cases where the measurements are just a string of text. For example, “L 12 inches; H 6 inches”.
properties.title: Measurement Text

properties.description: The type of measurement such as depth, circumference, length, width or height.
properties.title: Measurement Type

properties.description: The value of the measurement.
properties.title: Measurement Value

properties.description: Unit of measurement such as feet, inches, centimeters, etc.
properties.title: Measurement Unit

properties.description: A time period name, e.g. "the last voyage of Sinbad", "last week".
properties.title: Textual Date

properties.description: A specific numeric date associated with the entity being described.
properties.title: Numeric Date

properties.description: The type of numeric date such as begin date or end date.
properties.title: Date Type

properties.description: Explanatory text on the accuracy of the set of measurements.
properties.title: Measurement Accuracy
